name: Loaded Dice - A Multiverse Casino Heist!
name_original: Loaded Dice - A Multiverse Casino Heist!
description:
Loaded Dice is a very simple and short experimental 5-10 minute Visual Novel about a gang of thieves trying to pull off a Casino Heist! You play as Coin, who has the ability to shift the odds in their favour by shifting universes.

This project was made by two people in 48 hours for the GTMK Game Jam! A lot of content was cut due to time restraints and the actual universe shifting idea was added very last minute. I think there's a lot more we could've done with this, but I'm still really pleased with how this came out, especially since I've never done such a short jam before!

Credits

🎲 Programming and production by Niandra!

🎲 Writing by Rushfoil

🎲 Full credits coming soon! (Sorry, I need to get this submitted to the jam since there's like ten minutes left asdmklasmdlas)
